page.title: 11Housing
page.content: In our area there are two main settlements,one at Cliffe and one at Hemingbrough.In the surrounding areas there are a number of large farm-houses. Both villages are expanding to cater for new residents.There are new building sites and houses erected to fill spaces in the original villages. In Hemingbrough there are two new housing estates which are{Barratts}and {Jack Lunn.}On the Jack Lunn estate there are 52 bungalows and 31 houses. the Barratt estate has 68 houses,28 bungalows and 8 flats.The types of houses are Detatched,Semi-Detatched,Flats and Bungalows. The villages also have farmhouses and private houses.There are also a few business residences.
